author: Phil Vickery
method: To make the dip, blend the chickpeas, seasoning, olive oil and garlic in a food processor until you have a smooth, creamy texture. Add more olive oil if necessary. Spoon the dip into a serving dish and serve with bread and crudités.
ingredients: 200g/7oz tinned chickpeas, rinsed,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  glug olive oil,  1 garlic clove, peeled and chopped,  crusty bread,  crudités
